Class ClientContainerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
          • cam72cam.mod.gui.container.ClientContainerBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainerBuilder, net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback

    public class ClientContainerBuilder
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.inventory.GuiContainer
implements IContainerBuilder
    GUI Container wrapper for the client side, Do not use directly
